languages.text: "Как старший по статусу Вольный Торговец, я приказываю тебе оказать мне поддержку в свершении над ним правосудия".
"As the Rogue Trader in authority, I order you to aid me in bringing him to justice."
languages.original_text: "Как старший по статусу Вольный Торговец, я приказываю тебе оказать мне поддержку в свершении над ним правосудия".

languages.text: “身为行商浪人，这里的掌权者，我命令你协助我将他绳之以法。”
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader in authority, I order you to aid me in bringing him to justice."

traits.locale_text: “身为行商浪人，这里的掌权者，我命令你协助我将他绳之以法。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「権力を握る自由開拓者として、奴を裁くべく私に手を貸す事を命じる」
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader in authority, I order you to aid me in bringing him to justice."

traits.locale_text: 「権力を握る自由開拓者として、奴を裁くべく私に手を貸す事を命じる」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Como Comerciante Independiente, le ordeno que me ayude a llevarlo ante la justicia».
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader in authority, I order you to aid me in bringing him to justice."

traits.locale_text: «Como Comerciante Independiente, le ordeno que me ayude a llevarlo ante la justicia».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Als amtierende Freihändlerin befehle ich Euch: Helft mir, ihn gerecht zu bestrafen."
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader in authority, I order you to aid me in bringing him to justice."

traits.locale_text: "Als amtierende Freihändlerin befehle ich Euch: Helft mir, ihn gerecht zu bestrafen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « En tant que libre-marchande au pouvoir, je vous ordonne de m'aider à l'amener devant la justice. »
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader in authority, I order you to aid me in bringing him to justice."

traits.locale_text: « En tant que libre-marchande au pouvoir, je vous ordonne de m'aider à l'amener devant la justice. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Yetkili Hür Tacir olarak onu adaletin karşısına çıkarmamda bana yardım etmeni emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader in authority, I order you to aid me in bringing him to justice."

traits.locale_text: "Yetkili Hür Tacir olarak, onu adaletin karşısına çıkarmamda bana yardım etmeni emrediyorum."
